pages.text: While mining I often have trouble mining through deposits of gravel and other similar blocks. As soon as I mine one block, the gap is immediately filled by another falling from above!$(br)To solve this problem I have designed a trinket that stabilises these blocks using the power of $(red_magic). My $(item)Gravitic Stabiliser$() uses a small amount of $(thing)Charge$() per block stabilised

It is charged by the method described in $(l:basics/item_charging)Charging Items$(). The stabilising enchantment is quite fragile, it'll stand up to walking and jumping; but a good hit will break it, causing the block it was stabilising to fall.
